title: Security Scan Run Record
description: A single security scan execution with metadata and results

run_id.description: Unique identifier for this run, typically UUID or timestamp-based

started_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when scan execution began

finished_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when scan completed, null if still running

findings.description: Total number of vulnerabilities found in this run

worst.description: Highest severity level found across all findings

templates.description: Comma-separated list of Nuclei templates used (optional if templates_count present)

templates_count.description: Number of templates executed in this run

artifact.description: File path to raw Nuclei output artifact, null if not available

project_id.description: Foreign key to the project this run belongs to

endpoints_scanned.description: Number of unique endpoints tested in this run
